entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Vanier
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:53 PM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 13. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening then partly cloudy. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 4:52 PM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow. High minus 3.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy in the afternoon then snow. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h late in the afternoon. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:52 PM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow at times heavy. Temperature steady near minus 3.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Risk of freezing rain before morning. Snowfall amount 10 cm except 15 cm over northern sections. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 3. Wind chill minus 12 in the evening. Forecast issued 4:52 PM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023
